entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 09:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow at times heavy and blowing snow this morning then to flurries this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:52 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 06:52 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:52 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
